daily_fact: Residents of Staten Island are advocating for traffic calming measures on Hylan Boulevard, emphasizing that slowing down traffic will enhance safety and benefit the entire community.
topline_md: A fire at a tire shop in Queens has resulted in the destruction of an apartment building and left nine people injured, while NYC Mayor Zohran Mamdani proposes a four-year extension of mayoral control over schools amidst various housing and transit initiatives.
